data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 25,002 believers in Lac, Chad a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lac, Chad
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Lac.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary: On average, 156 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Lac, Chad.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Lac, Chad who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Lac. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Kanembu people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, sanctify the 25,002 believers in Lac and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, help the 25,002 believers in Lac to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 318,498 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Lac to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
